room_title: Escape room "Once Upon a Time" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: Had a great time. We did the Little Prince room. Really fun time. We were 6 people and everyone had fun. Real team event. Erika helped make the experience a pleasure. Will recommend. Can't wait to try another room.

room_title: Escape room "Once Upon a Time" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: This was our second time at Can You Escape, and we loved it both times! This time we did Once Upon a Time. Our hosts Karli and gamemaster Erika were fun and enthusiastic! We will definitely be going back. Thanks for an awesome evening with my boys!

room_title: Escape room "Once Upon a Time" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: We had an amazing time. Erica and Shaun were both great. They were helpful but didn't give anything away. We enjoyed the experience in the Once Upon a Time room very much.

room_title: Escape room "Once Upon a Time" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: I had the best time today - and it was my first time doing something of this sort! I give five stars because even though I went with two other people, we not only were able to escape, we were able to escape with time remaining! The biggest hint to escaping....time management! That's all I will say because the rest is for you to find out! It was so much fun, and definitely will be making a trip to this place a tradition!

room_title: Escape room "Once Upon a Time" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: Such a good time ! Deffinately recommend to go with a good group
